About Us

HighVoltage is a competitive PUBG team known for strategic dominance and aggressive gameplay. We’re a squad of sharpshooters, grenadiers, and tacticians. Our mission is to electrify the PUBG scene with thrilling plays and top-tier performances. Join us on our journey to the top! HighVoltage is more than a team; it's a family united by a passion for victory and the thrill of the game. We believe in teamwork, dedication, and the relentless pursuit of excellence. Together, we rise, together we conquer. We are among the elite, and we play to win.





Latest News

We just placed top 3 in the Global PUBG Championship! Next stop: Victory Lane at the Fall Invitational. Stay tuned for match updates and highlights on our social media channels.
